EmailTemplate.description: This is the default template for the Dimagi Partner program. Don't forget to add the attachment.
EmailTemplate.name: Sales - Partner Program
EmailTemplate.subject: Dimagi Partner Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
ADD ATTACHMENT
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}, I'm reaching out to inform you about the Dimagi Partner Program. The program is designed to enable partners to design, build, and deploy their own applications and technology on Dimagi’s platform. The purpose of the program is to support and recognize the success of service and technology partners who participate in deploying Dimagi’s products to organizations worldwide.
How to get started:
Read through the Program Guide (attached)
Fill out the Application form
Sign-up and complete the CommCare Fundamentals short course on CommCare Academy
If you have any more questions or would like to set up a time to chat with someone and learn more about the Dimagi Partner Program, please email partner-program@dimagi.com
